title: ISIS claims Pakistan suicide bombing, underlining twin security threats
description: After the blast that killed at least 46, suspicion had fallen on the larger Pakistani Taliban group.

title: African nations threaten military intervention in Niger after coup
description: ECOWAS, the bloc of 15 West African countries, said it would take all measures necessary if the elected president is not returned to power.

title: Severe floods hit typhoon-damaged Beijing
description: Hundreds of roads in and around Beijing were flooded Monday, with videos posted on social media showing a broken bridge and cars swept away on the swelling Yongding River.

title: Ukraine live briefing: At least 10 dead, more than 100 injured after missile strike on Zelensky’s hometown
description: Emergency services in Kryvyi Rih are working to rescue those buried under the rubble, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said.

title: India joins rush to renewables, but its rural solar systems fall off grid
description: A cautionary tale for a world racing into renewables: The large majority of mini-grids in India no longer work, an environmental group found.

title: As the world boils, a backlash to climate action gains strength
description: Despite the visceral evidence of a warming planet, and the entreaties of U.N. officials and climate scientists, there’s little political unanimity on what must come next.
